documentation.text:
@dev Check if a private payment was recorded for this product
 @return bool True if private payment was recorded

getPrivatePaymentDetails().details: Get private payment details for this product

returns.memoHash: The memo hash used in the private transfer
returns.recorder: The address that recorded the payment

hasPrivatePayment().details: Check if a private payment was recorded for this product

returns._0: bool True if private payment was recorded

recordPrivatePayment(bytes32,bytes32).details: Record a private payment made via Railgun

params._memoHash: Hash of the memo used in the private transfer
params._railgunTxRef: Reference to the Railgun transaction  This function can be called by: - Buyer (after making private payment) - Seller (after receiving private payment) - Auditor/Indexer (with proper authorization)
